nodes.text: The Shu-Torun Loyalist/Imperial Delving Fleet was a joint military fleet of combat drills created from the joint forces of the Galactic Empire and native forces loyal to Queen Trios and the Shu-Torun royalty during the War on Shu-Torun, in order to mount an attack on the delving citadel of Duke Rubix, leader of the rebellious ore-dukes.
